verses.text: Thus hath the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd* \w shewed|strong="H7200"\w* unto me: and behold a \w basket|strong="H3619"\w* of summer \w fruit|strong="H7019"\w*.

And he \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Amos|strong="H5986"\w*, what \w seest|strong="H7200"\w* thou? And I \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, A \w basket|strong="H3619"\w* of summer \w fruit|strong="H7019"\w*. Then \w said|strong="H0559"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* unto me, The \w end|strong="H7093"\w* is \w come|strong="H0935"\w* upon my \w people|strong="H5971"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*; I will not \w again|strong="H3254"\w* \w pass|strong="H5674"\w* by them any more.

And the \w songs|strong="H7892"\w* of the \w temple|strong="H1964"\w* shall be \w howlings|strong="H3213"\w* in that \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd*: \add there shall be\add* \w many|strong="H7227"\w* dead \w bodies|strong="H6297"\w* in every \w place|strong="H4725"\w*; they shall cast \add them\add* \w forth|strong="H7993"\w* with \w silence|strong="H2013"\w*.\f + \fr 8.3 \ft shall be howlings: Heb. shall howl\f*\f + \fr 8.3 \ft with…: Heb. be silent\f*

¶ \w Hear|strong="H8085"\w* this, O ye that swallow \w up|strong="H7602"\w* the \w needy|strong="H0034"\w*, even to \w make|strong="H7673"\w* the \w poor|strong="H6041"\w* of the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* to \w fail|strong="H7673"\w*,

\w Saying|strong="H0559"\w*, When will the new \w moon|strong="H2320"\w* be \w gone|strong="H5674"\w*, that we may \w sell|strong="H7666"\w* \w corn|strong="H7668"\w*? and the \w sabbath|strong="H7676"\w*, that we may set \w forth|strong="H6605"\w* \w wheat|strong="H1250"\w*, making the \w ephah|strong="H0374"\w* \w small|strong="H6994"\w*, and the \w shekel|strong="H8255"\w* \w great|strong="H1431"\w*, and \w falsifying|strong="H5791"\w* the \w balances|strong="H3976"\w* by \w deceit|strong="H4820"\w*?\f + \fr 8.5 \ft new…: or, month\f*\f + \fr 8.5 \ft set…: Heb. open\f*\f + \fr 8.5 \ft falsifying…: Heb. perverting the balances of deceit\f*

That we may \w buy|strong="H7069"\w* the \w poor|strong="H1800"\w* for \w silver|strong="H3701"\w*, and the \w needy|strong="H0034"\w* for a pair of \w shoes|strong="H5275"\w*; \add yea\add*, and \w sell|strong="H7666"\w* the \w refuse|strong="H4651"\w* of the \w wheat|strong="H1250"\w*?

The \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* hath \w sworn|strong="H7650"\w* by the \w excellency|strong="H1347"\w* of \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w*, Surely I will \w never|strong="H5331"\w* \w forget|strong="H7911"\w* any of their \w works|strong="H4639"\w*.

Shall not the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* \w tremble|strong="H7264"\w* for this, and every one \w mourn|strong="H0056"\w* that \w dwelleth|strong="H3427"\w* therein? and it shall rise \w up|strong="H5927"\w* wholly as a \w flood|strong="H2975"\w*; and it shall be cast \w out|strong="H1644"\w* and \w drowned|strong="H8257"\w*, as \add by\add* the \w flood|strong="H0216"\w* of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*.

And it shall come to pass in that \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd*, that I will cause the \w sun|strong="H8121"\w* to go \w down|strong="H0935"\w* at \w noon|strong="H6672"\w*, and I will \w darken|strong="H2821"\w* the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w* in the \w clear|strong="H0216"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w*:

And I will \w turn|strong="H2015"\w* your \w feasts|strong="H2282"\w* into \w mourning|strong="H0060"\w*, and all your \w songs|strong="H7892"\w* into \w lamentation|strong="H7015"\w*; and I will bring \w up|strong="H5927"\w* \w sackcloth|strong="H8242"\w* upon all \w loins|strong="H4975"\w*, and \w baldness|strong="H7144"\w* upon every \w head|strong="H7218"\w*; and I will \w make|strong="H7760"\w* it as the \w mourning|strong="H0060"\w* of an \w only|strong="H3173"\w* \add son\add*, and the \w end|strong="H0319"\w* thereof as a \w bitter|strong="H4751"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w*.

¶ Behold, the \w days|strong="H3117"\w* \w come|strong="H0935"\w*, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* 
d \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*
d*, that I will \w send|strong="H7971"\w* a \w famine|strong="H7458"\w* in the \w land|strong="H0776"\w*, not a \w famine|strong="H7458"\w* of \w bread|strong="H3899"\w*, nor a \w thirst|strong="H6772"\w* for \w water|strong="H4325"\w*, but of \w hearing|strong="H8085"\w* the \w words|strong="H1697"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*:

And they shall \w wander|strong="H5128"\w* from \w sea|strong="H3220"\w* to \w sea|strong="H3220"\w*, and from the \w north|strong="H6828"\w* even to the \w east|strong="H4217"\w*, they shall run to and \w fro|strong="H7751"\w* to \w seek|strong="H1245"\w* the \w word|strong="H1697"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, and shall not \w find|strong="H4672"\w* \add it\add*.
In that \w day|strong="H3117"\w* shall the \w fair|strong="H3303"\w* \w virgins|strong="H1330"\w* and young \w men|strong="H0970"\w* \w faint|strong="H5968"\w* for \w thirst|strong="H6772"\w*.

They that \w swear|strong="H7650"\w* by the \w sin|strong="H0819"\w* of \w Samaria|strong="H8111"\w*, and \w say|strong="H0559"\w*, Thy \w god|strong="H0430"\w*, O \w Dan|strong="H1835"\w*, \w liveth|strong="H2416"\w*; and, The \w manner|strong="H1870"\w* of \w Beer-sheba|strong="H0884"\w* \w liveth|strong="H2416"\w*; even they shall \w fall|strong="H5307"\w*, and never rise \w up|strong="H6965"\w* again.\f + \fr 8.14 \ft manner: Heb. way\f*
